{"id":438615000,"lang":"python3","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1609800170,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"124 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/438615000/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"14.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSumSmaller(self, nums, target):\n        sortedNums = sorted(nums)\n        ans = 0\n\n        if not nums :\n            return ans\n\n        for i,num in enumerate(sortedNums):\n            l,r = i+1, len(nums)-1\n            while l < r:\n                if num + sortedNums[l] + sortedNums[r] >= target:\n                    r -= 1 \n                else:\n                    ans += r - l\n                    l += 1\n        return ans\n\n\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller"}
